ygData.subject: Plane of Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: Question to all servers once again? Has *any* imbrued armor dropped since the patch on this past Wednesday? The armor was supposedly moved to the plane of hate
ygData.messageBody:
Question to all servers once again? Has *any* imbrued armor dropped since the patch on this past
Wednesday? The armor was supposedly moved to the plane of hate since it is no longer dropped on
boogeymen, but none has dropped yet on any mobs on my server (Tarew Marr). I'm starting to
believe Verant forgot to put our stuff in after they jacked it from boogeymen.

Regarding the Maestro, how far in is he? You said it took 8 hours. And how hard is he? Does he
cast any special type of spells?

Also, when pulling mobs, have you had any weird bugs, where a single mob is pulled, and about 3
minutes into the fight, 5 - 10+ mobs come outta no where and wipe out everyone? Even with monks
feign pulling, and staying feigned while the rest of us fought so to keep aggro clear, we still
get trained everytime.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr

Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> i think you are referring to scorn banshees (look like fetid fiends). i got
> a bard only martune rapier from a banshee (piercing dmg8 del23 5str 4agi).
> i do not know if they now drop our imbrued armor as i heard boogeymen no
> longer drop it but now have necro armor in pof. the maestro of rancor i
> think is our real best friend. the first night groups on our server went, i
> did not go and am still kicking myself several days later. he dropped a
> bard only sword (1h slashing dmg11 del25, i think called sword of the six
> notes). our best weapon to date, no bards there and it was destroyed =(
> the next night i did go and after i got the rapier (on the very first kill
> of the night) we got to the maestro about 8 or so hours later. no sword,
> but i did get Kelin's Seven Stringed Lute (dex9 cha15 agi9). i kinda got
> excited and destroyed my normal mandolin before testing and have not gotten
> around to buying another since (sorry mr. kim hehe). i did try healing and
> i got 25 or 26 per pulse. i can't remember what a level 50 with normal
> mandolin heals per tick but i thought it was 22. i'll get around to testing
> the effects as soon as i remember to buy a new mandolin =)
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L27 High Elf Wizard
> Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin
> Manda D'ulin, L21 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
